subject: 3 CGMs Committees for Recommending the offer of NHAI in conciliation through Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts.
text: HRTy <44 TTTAf xfetarut TM9 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (sw 4dr7 3R  TTTATf 4A1T4) Y4 Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 & 6, #de7-10, ERqT , T fecrft-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Conciliation Committee/2021 Policy Guidelines No.2.1.46 /2021 dated 19th February, 2021 (Decision taken on e-file Comp. No.57979) Sub: 3 CGMs Committees for recommending the offers of NHAl in conciliation through Conciliation Committees of Independent Experts. Reference NHAI office order No. NHAI/ CMD /Conciliation/2021 (comp. no. 57979) dated 25.01.2021 (Annexure-1), it was decided that Technical Divisions shall route files through Member (Admn.) for allotment of cases to a particular 3 CGM Committee. 2 As per the revised work allocation to Members circulated vide note dt. 12.02.2021 (Annexure-2) , the work pertaining to Contract Management Division has been allocated to Member  (Projects) Sh. R.K, Pandey. In view of   this, it has been decided that henceforth Tech. Divisions shall route files   through Member   looking after works of Contract Management Division for allotment of cases to a particular 3 CGM Committee: 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Ikawd/9.62 (Sheo Shankar Jha) Chief General Manager (Coord.) To: All officers & staff of NHAI HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices to: 13 PS to Chairman 2. PS to AII Members/CVo 3. Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi 4. Library for hosting the circular on library site 5. Web admin for circulation 2n RIrIM NHAL 132 ( Copy
